attributes.action: introduce a bill to reduce to £1 the salaries of named and shamed MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: introduce in the house of commons a bill to reduce the salaries of those MPs named and shamed by the Telegraph, and who are standing down at the next election, to an annual amount of £1

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
